message.content: This question requires knowledge about different types of metals and where they are commonly found. Ferrous metals are metals that contain iron, and they are commonly found in vehicle scraps. Option (A) is incorrect because grass does not contain ferrous metals. Option (C) is incorrect because wood is a biological material and does not contain metals. Option (D) is incorrect because glass is made from silica and does not contain metals.

This question requires some basic knowledge about different types of metals. Ferrous metals are metals that contain iron. Vehicle scraps often contain various types of metals, including ferrous metals, which are used in the construction of vehicles. Option (A) is incorrect because grass is not a source of ferrous metals. Option (C) is incorrect because wood is not a source of any type of metal. Option (D) is incorrect because glass is not a source of ferrous metals.

Option (C) is incorrect because wood is a non-metallic material. Option (D) is incorrect because glass is also a non-metallic material.
